ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: E.P.L. thanks Gerard Pepe for its help for the study of Ulva blooms in the Mediterranean seas. E.P.L. thanks Fabrice Roth from Prefecture de Bretagne, Sylvain Ballu from Cente d’Evaluation et de Valorisation des Algues and CRESEB from Conseil Régional de Bretagne for fruitful discussions. E.P.L. thanks Ian McBitter for reviewing the manuscript.
